00046 AccessGroup::AccessGroup(TableIdentifier *identifier, SchemaPtr &schemaPtr, Schema::AccessGroup *ag, RangeSpec *range) : CellList(), m_identifier(identifier), m_schema_ptr(schemaPtr), m_name(ag->name), m_stores(), m_cell_cache_ptr(), m_next_table_id(0), m_disk_usage(0), m_blocksize(DEFAULT_BLOCKSIZE), m_compression_ratio(1.0), m_is_root(false), m_oldest_cached_timestamp(0), m_collisions(0), m_needs_compaction(false), m_drop(false), m_scanners_blocked(false) {
00047   m_table_name = m_identifier.name;
00048   m_start_row = range->start_row;
00049   m_end_row = range->end_row;
00050   m_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00051 
00052   for (list<Schema::ColumnFamily *>::iterator iter = ag->columns.begin(); iter != ag->columns.end(); iter++) {
00053     m_column_families.insert((uint8_t)(*iter)->id);
00054   }
00055   if (ag->blocksize != 0)
00056     m_blocksize = ag->blocksize;
00057 
00058   m_compressor = (ag->compressor != "") ? ag->compressor : schemaPtr->get_compressor();
00059 
00060   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0 && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00061 
00062   m_in_memory = ag->in_memory;
00063 }

00066 AccessGroup::~AccessGroup() {
00067   if (m_drop) {
00068     if (m_identifier.id == 0) {
00069       HT_ERROR("~AccessGroup has drop bit set, but table is METADATA");
00070       return;
00071     }
00072     String metadata_key = String("") + (uint32_t)m_identifier.id + ":" + m_end_row;
00073     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00074     KeySpec key;
00075 
00076     try {
00077 
00078       mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00079 
00080       key.row = metadata_key.c_str();
00081       key.row_len = metadata_key.length();
00082       key.column_family = "Files";
00083       key.column_qualifier = m_name.c_str();
00084       key.column_qualifier_len = m_name.length();
00085       mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)"!", 1);
00086       mutator_ptr->flush();
00087     }
00088     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00089       // TODO: propagate exception
00090       HT_ERRORF("Problem updating 'File' column of METADATA (%s) - %s",
00091                 metadata_key.c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00092     }
00093   }
00094   return;
00095 }

00102 int AccessGroup::add(const ByteString key, const ByteString value, uint64_t real_timestamp) {
00103   // assumes timestamps are coming in order
00104   if (m_oldest_cached_timestamp == 0)
00105     m_oldest_cached_timestamp = real_timestamp;
00106   return m_cell_cache_ptr->add(key, value, real_timestamp);
00107 }

00112 bool AccessGroup::replay_add(const ByteString key, const ByteString value, uint64_t real_timestamp) {
00113   if (real_timestamp > m_compaction_timestamp.real) {
00114     if (m_oldest_cached_timestamp == 0)
00115       m_oldest_cached_timestamp = real_timestamp;
00116     m_cell_cache_ptr->add(key, value, real_timestamp);
00117     return true;
00118   }
00119   return false;
00120 }

00123 CellListScanner *AccessGroup::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_context_ptr) {
00124   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00125   MergeScanner *scanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context_ptr);
00126   String filename;
00127 
00128   while (m_scanners_blocked)
00129     m_scanner_blocked_cond.wait(lock);
00130 
00131   scanner->add_scanner( m_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr) );
00132   if (!m_in_memory) {
00133     CellStoreReleaseCallback callback(this);
00134     for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00135       scanner->add_scanner( m_stores[i]->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr) );
00136       filename = m_stores[i]->get_filename();
00137       callback.add_file(filename);
00138       increment_file_refcount(filename);
00139     }
00140     scanner->install_release_callback(callback);
00141   }
00142   return scanner;
00143 }

00145 bool AccessGroup::include_in_scan(ScanContextPtr &scan_context_ptr) {
00146   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00147   for (std::set<uint8_t>::iterator iter = m_column_families.begin(); iter != m_column_families.end(); iter++) {
00148     if (scan_context_ptr->familyMask[*iter])
00149       return true;
00150   }
00151   return false;
00152 }

00154 const char *AccessGroup::get_split_row() {
00155   std::vector<String> split_rows;
00156   get_split_rows(split_rows, true);
00157   if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00158     sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00159     return (split_rows[split_rows.size()/2]).c_str();
00160   }
00161   return "";
00162 }
00163 
00164 void AccessGroup::get_split_rows(std::vector<String> &split_rows, bool include_cache) {
00165   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00166   const char *row;
00167   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00168     row = m_stores[i]->get_split_row();
00169     if (row)
00170       split_rows.push_back(row);
00171   }
00172   if (include_cache)
00173     m_cell_cache_ptr->get_split_rows(split_rows);
00174 }

00176 void AccessGroup::get_cached_rows(std::vector<String> &rows) {
00177   m_cell_cache_ptr->get_rows(rows);
00178 }
00179 
00180 uint64_t AccessGroup::disk_usage() {
00181   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00182   uint64_t du = (m_in_memory) ? m_disk_usage : 0;
00183   return du + (uint64_t)(m_compression_ratio * (float)m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used());
00184 }
00185 
00186 void AccessGroup::get_compaction_priority_data(CompactionPriorityDataT &priority_data) {
00187   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00188   priority_data.ag = this;
00189   priority_data.oldest_cached_timestamp = m_oldest_cached_timestamp;
00190   priority_data.mem_used = m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00191   priority_data.disk_used = m_disk_usage + (uint64_t)(m_compression_ratio * (float)m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used());
00192   priority_data.in_memory = m_in_memory;
00193   priority_data.deletes = m_cell_cache_ptr->get_delete_count();
00194 }

00197 void AccessGroup::add_cell_store(CellStorePtr &cellstore_ptr, uint32_t id) {
00198   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00199 
00200   // Figure out the "next" CellStore number
00201   if (id >= m_next_table_id)
00202     m_next_table_id = id+1;
00203   else if (m_in_memory)
00204     return;
00205 
00206   m_disk_usage += cellstore_ptr->disk_usage();
00207 
00208   // Record the most recent compaction timestamp
00209   if (m_compaction_timestamp.logical == 0)
00210     cellstore_ptr->get_timestamp(m_compaction_timestamp);
00211   else {
00212     Timestamp timestamp;
00213     cellstore_ptr->get_timestamp(timestamp);
00214     if (timestamp.real > m_compaction_timestamp.real)
00215       m_compaction_timestamp = timestamp;
00216   }
00217 
00218   if (m_in_memory) {
00219     ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(END_OF_TIME, m_schema_ptr);
00220     CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr = cellstore_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00221     ByteString key, value;
00222     m_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00223     while (scanner_ptr->get(key, value)) {
00224       m_cell_cache_ptr->add(key, value, m_compaction_timestamp.real);
00225       scanner_ptr->forward();
00226     }
00227   }
00228 
00229   m_stores.push_back(cellstore_ptr);
00230 
00231 }

00234 namespace {
00235   struct ltCellStore {
00236     bool operator()(const CellStorePtr &csPtr1, const CellStorePtr &csPtr2) const {
00237       return !(csPtr1->disk_usage() < csPtr2->disk_usage());
00238     }
00239   };
00240 }

00243 void AccessGroup::run_compaction(Timestamp timestamp, bool major) {
00244   String cellStoreFile;
00245   char md5DigestStr[33];
00246   char filename[16];
00247   ByteString key;
00248   ByteString value;
00249   Key keyComps;
00250   CellListScannerPtr scannerPtr;
00251   size_t tableIndex = 1;
00252   CellStorePtr cellStorePtr;
00253   String metadata_key_str;
00254 
00255   if (!major && !m_needs_compaction)
00256     return;
00257 
00258   m_needs_compaction = false;
00259 
00260   {
00261     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00262     if (m_in_memory) {
00263       tableIndex = m_stores.size();
00264       HT_INFOF("Starting InMemory Compaction (%s.%s end_row='%s')", m_table_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00265     }
00266     else if (major) {
00267       // TODO: if the oldest CellCache entry is newer than timestamp, then return
00268       if (m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used() == 0 && m_stores.size() <= (size_t)1)
00269         return;
00270       tableIndex = 0;
00271       HT_INFOF("Starting Major Compaction (%s.%s)", m_table_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00272     }
00273     else {
00274       if (m_stores.size() > (size_t)Global::localityGroupMaxFiles) {
00275         ltCellStore sortObj;
00276         sort(m_stores.begin(), m_stores.end(), sortObj);
00277         tableIndex = m_stores.size() - Global::localityGroupMergeFiles;
00278         HT_INFOF("Starting Merging Compaction (%s.%s)", m_table_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00279       }
00280       else {
00281         tableIndex = m_stores.size();
00282         HT_INFOF("Starting Minor Compaction (%s.%s)", m_table_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00283       }
00284     }
00285   }
00286 
00287   if (m_end_row == "")
00288     memset(md5DigestStr, '0', 24);
00289   else
00290     md5_string(m_end_row.c_str(), md5DigestStr);
00291   md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00292   sprintf(filename, "cs%d", m_next_table_id++);
00293   cellStoreFile = (string)"/hypertable/tables/" + m_table_name + "/" + m_name + "/" + md5DigestStr + "/" + filename;
00294   
00295   cellStorePtr = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00296 
00297   if (cellStorePtr->create(cellStoreFile.c_str(), m_blocksize, m_compressor) != 0) {
00298     HT_ERRORF("Problem compacting locality group to file '%s'", cellStoreFile.c_str());
00299     return;
00300   }
00301 
00302   {
00303     ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(timestamp.logical+1, m_schema_ptr);
00304 
00305     if (m_in_memory) {
00306       MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context_ptr, false);
00307       mscanner->add_scanner( m_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr) );
00308       scannerPtr = mscanner;
00309     }
00310     else if (major || tableIndex < m_stores.size()) {
00311       MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context_ptr, !major);
00312       mscanner->add_scanner( m_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr) );
00313       for (size_t i=tableIndex; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00314         mscanner->add_scanner( m_stores[i]->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr) );
00315       scannerPtr = mscanner;
00316     }
00317     else
00318       scannerPtr = m_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00319   }
00320 
00321   while (scannerPtr->get(key, value)) {
00322 
00323     if (!keyComps.load(key)) {
00324       HT_ERROR("Problem deserializing key/value pair");
00325       return;
00326     }
00327 
00328     if (keyComps.timestamp <= timestamp.logical)
00329       cellStorePtr->add(key, value, timestamp.real);
00330 
00331     scannerPtr->forward();
00332   }
00333 
00334   if (cellStorePtr->finalize(timestamp) != 0) {
00335     HT_ERRORF("Problem finalizing CellStore '%s'", cellStoreFile.c_str());
00336     return;
00337   }
00338 
00342   {
00343     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00344     CellCachePtr tmp_cell_cache_ptr;
00345 
00347     tmp_cell_cache_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr;
00348     tmp_cell_cache_ptr->lock();
00349     m_collisions += m_cell_cache_ptr->get_collision_count();
00350     if (m_in_memory)
00351       m_cell_cache_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr->purge_deletes();
00352     else
00353       m_cell_cache_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr->slice_copy(timestamp.logical);
00354     // If inserts have arrived since we started splitting, then set the oldest cached timestamp value, otherwise clear it
00355     m_oldest_cached_timestamp = (m_cell_cache_ptr->size() > 0) ? timestamp.real + 1 : 0;
00356     tmp_cell_cache_ptr->unlock();    
00357 
00359     if (tableIndex < m_stores.size()) {
00360       m_stores.resize(tableIndex);
00361       m_live_files.clear();
00362       for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00363         m_live_files.insert( m_stores[i]->get_filename() );
00364     }
00365 
00366     if (m_in_memory) {
00367       m_stores.clear();
00368       m_live_files.clear();
00369     }
00370 
00372     m_stores.push_back( cellStorePtr );
00373     m_live_files.insert( cellStorePtr->get_filename() );
00374 
00376     m_gc_locked_files.clear();
00377     foreach(const FileRefCountMapT::value_type &v, m_file_refcounts)
00378       if (m_live_files.count(v.first) == 0)
00379         m_gc_locked_files.insert(v.first);
00380 
00382     m_disk_usage = 0;
00383     m_compression_ratio = 0.0;
00384     for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00385       m_disk_usage += m_stores[i]->disk_usage();
00386       m_compression_ratio += m_stores[i]->compression_ratio();
00387     }
00388     m_compression_ratio /= m_stores.size();
00389 
00390     m_compaction_timestamp = timestamp;
00391 
00392     m_scanners_blocked = true;
00393   }
00394 
00395   update_files_column();
00396 
00400   m_scanners_blocked = false;
00401   m_scanner_blocked_cond.notify_all();
00402 
00403 
00404   HT_INFOF("Finished Compaction (%s.%s)", m_table_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00405 }

00411 int AccessGroup::shrink(String &new_start_row) {
00412   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00413   int error;
00414   CellCachePtr old_cell_cache_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr;
00415   CellCachePtr new_cell_cache_ptr;
00416   ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(END_OF_TIME, m_schema_ptr);
00417   CellListScannerPtr cell_cache_scanner_ptr;
00418   ByteString key;
00419   ByteString value;
00420   std::vector<CellStorePtr> new_stores;
00421   CellStore *new_cell_store;
00422   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
00423   uint64_t items_added = 0;
00424 
00425   m_start_row = new_start_row;
00426 
00427   new_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00428   new_cell_cache_ptr->lock();
00429 
00430   m_cell_cache_ptr = new_cell_cache_ptr;
00431 
00432   cell_cache_scanner_ptr = old_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00433 
00437   while (cell_cache_scanner_ptr->get(key, value)) {
00438     if (strcmp(key.str(), m_start_row.c_str()) > 0) {
00439       add(key, value, 0);
00440       memory_added += key.length() + value.length();
00441       items_added++;
00442     }
00443     cell_cache_scanner_ptr->forward();
00444   }
00445 
00446   new_cell_cache_ptr->unlock();
00447 
00448   Global::memory_tracker.add_memory(memory_added);
00449   Global::memory_tracker.add_items(items_added);
00450 
00454   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00455     String filename = m_stores[i]->get_filename();
00456     new_cell_store = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00457     if ((error = new_cell_store->open(filename.c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str())) != Error::OK) {
00458       HT_ERRORF("Problem opening cell store '%s' [%s:%s] - %s",
00459                    filename.c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00460       return error;
00461     }
00462     if ((error = new_cell_store->load_index()) != Error::OK) {
00463       HT_ERRORF("Problem loading index of cell store '%s' [%s:%s] - %s",
00464                    filename.c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00465       return error;
00466     }
00467     new_stores.push_back(new_cell_store);
00468   }
00469 
00470   m_stores = new_stores;
00471 
00472   return Error::OK;
00473 }

00480 void AccessGroup::get_compaction_timestamp(Timestamp &timestamp) {
00481   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00482   timestamp = m_compaction_timestamp;

00488 void AccessGroup::get_files(String &text) {
00489   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00490   text = "";
00491   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00492     text += m_stores[i]->get_filename() + ";\n";
00493 }

00495 
00498 void AccessGroup::release_files(const std::vector<String> &files) {
00499   bool need_files_update = false;
00500 
00501   {
00502     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00503     for (size_t i=0; i<files.size(); i++) {
00504       if (decrement_file_refcount(files[i])) {
00505         if (m_gc_locked_files.count(files[i]) > 0) {
00506           m_gc_locked_files.erase(files[i]);
00507           need_files_update = true;
00508         }
00509       }
00510     }
00511   }
00512 
00513   if (need_files_update)
00514     update_files_column();
00515 }
00516 
00519 void AccessGroup::update_files_column() {
00520   String files;
00521 
00522   {
00523     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00524 
00528     files = "";
00529     // get the "live" ones
00530     for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00531       files += m_stores[i]->get_filename() + ";\n";
00532     // get the "locked" ones (prevents gc)
00533     foreach(const String &f, m_gc_locked_files)
00534       files += format("#%s;\n", f.c_str());
00535   }
00536 
00537   try {
00538     if (m_is_root) {
00539       MetadataRoot metadata(m_schema_ptr);
00540       metadata.write_files(m_name, files);
00541     }
00542     else {
00543       MetadataNormal metadata(&m_identifier, m_end_row);
00544       metadata.write_files(m_name, files);
00545     }
00546   }
00547   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00548     // TODO: propagate exception
00549     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Problem updating 'Files' column of METADATA: "
00550                  << e << HT_ERROR_END;
00551   }
00552 }

00554 
00558 void AccessGroup::increment_file_refcount(const String &filename) {
00559   FileRefCountMapT::iterator iter = m_file_refcounts.find(filename);
00560 
00561   if (iter == m_file_refcounts.end())
00562     m_file_refcounts[filename] = 1;
00563   else
00564     (*iter).second++;
00565 }
00566 
00567 
00571 bool AccessGroup::decrement_file_refcount(const String &filename) {
00572   FileRefCountMapT::iterator iter = m_file_refcounts.find(filename);
00573 
00574   HT_EXPECT(iter != m_file_refcounts.end(), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00575 
00576   if (--(*iter).second == 0) {
00577     m_file_refcounts.erase(iter);
00578     return true;
00579   }
00580 
00581   return false;
00582 }
